Desc.entry: A society run by Sheffield University students and affiliated with the Sheffield Esteli Society/Nicaragua Solidarity Campaign (see separate entry). Maintains links between Sheffield University and Esteli University, in Sheffield's twin town. Raises funds to support projects at the University in Nicaragua. Organises an annual English course for Esteli students which is taught by Sheffield students.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon 5-6pm, please check notices on the doors for the specific room as this may change
